name: Serath's Dilemma
description:
ue4jam: Marketplace Takeover entry

Control Serath to crush your enemies.

W/A/S/D = Movement

Left Mouse Button = Attack

Right Mouse Button = Use skill

"1" + Right Mouse Button = Activate and Use AOE skill

Mouse Wheel = Zoom IN/OUT

Left Shift= Dash

F key = Transform

Space Bar = Jump
